CustomField.formula: IF(OR( AND(Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)= 'Bottler',Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)= 'Bottler',FS_Approved_Bottler_Order_Delivery__c=false), AND(Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)= 'Distributor',Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)= 'Distributor',TEXT(FS_Approved_for_Distributor_Ordering__c)==''), AND(OR(Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)= 'VMS',Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)= 'Direct Ship',Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)= 'CokeSmart'),Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)= 'Distributor',TEXT(FS_Approved_for_Distributor_Ordering__c)==''), AND(OR(FS_Final_Order_Text_value__c='VMS',FS_Final_Order_Text_value__c='CokeSmart',FS_Final_Order_Text_value__c='Distributor'),FS_Final_Delivery_text_value__c='Distributor',OR(TEXT(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)='VMS',TEXT(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)='CokeSmart'),Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)='Direct Ship',TEXT(FS_Approved_for_Distributor_Ordering__c)==''), AND(Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)= 'Direct Ship',Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)= 'Bottler',FS_Approved_Bottler_Order_Delivery__c=false), AND(OR(TEXT(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)='Bottler',TEXT(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)='Direct Ship'),Text(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)='',FS_Approved_Bottler_Order_Delivery__c=false), AND(TEXT(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)='Bottler',Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)='',FS_Approved_Bottler_Order_Delivery__c=false), AND(TEXT(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)='Manual Order',Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)='Direct Ship', ISPICKVAL(FS_Manual_Order_Approval_Status__c,'Reject') ), AND(TEXT(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c)='Manual Order',Text(FS_Requested_Delivery_Method__c)='Direct Ship', ISPICKVAL(FS_Manual_Order_Approval_Status__c,'') )), FS_Final_Order_Text_value__c,TEXT(FS_Requested_Order_Method__c))
CustomField.label: Final Order Method
